response.job_title: Civil Engineer and M.Sc. in Water Resources and Environmental Management
response.summary:
I'm a Civil engineer and M. Sc. in Water Resources and Environmental Management. I was a DAAD Scholar and possess work experience on public entities and private companies of national and multi-Latin reach. 

The previous has given me relevant knowledge of the technical aspects of water resources and sanitary engineering, complemented with the economic aspects of the technical processes and tariffs regulation in the Latinamerican environment.

Alongside my experience, my personal skills include a high conversational and writing level in Spanish, English, and German; as well as an intermediate level in Portuguese and a basic level in the French language. 

Also, I have strong interpersonal, communicative, and organizational skills due to my different work positions as both an entry-level worker and area leader, and my interest in theater and public speaking.

Finally, I manage several computer skills like the complete Microsoft Office Suite, CAD and GIS programs, water and waste management software, and programming skills.
response.skills: Water Governance, Green Infrastructure, Typo3, Minitab, Communication, Mendeley, RStudio, Umberto, Stan, Public Speaking, Project Management, WEAP, FEFLOW, EPA-SWMM, Stormwater Management, EPANET, HEC-RAS, SIMBA#, University Teaching, Intercultural Communication
